description: Retty App for Android versions prior to 4.8.13 and Retty App for iOS versions prior to 4.11.14 uses a hard-coded API key for an external service. By exploiting this vulnerability, API key for an external service may be obtained by analyzing data in the app.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Retty App for Android versions prior to 4.8.13 and Retty App for iOS versions prior to 4.11.14
